Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Identified the need to recognize a specific sequence ('Approve Purchase Requisition', 'Create Order', 'Confirm Order') in direct order within each case.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Determined that the sequence can be identified using window functions such as LEAD to examine consecutive rows in the ordered dataset.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Recognized the condition that the time interval between 'Create Order' and 'Confirm Order' must be more than 5 days, and that this can be calculated using timestamp differences.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Validated that cases meeting both the sequence and timing conditions can be excluded using a filtering condition (case_id NOT IN excluded cases).

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Generalized from edge cases that the solution must correctly handle situations where intervals are exactly 5 days or slightly over.

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - IND
Text: Reflected on the importance of preserving all relevant information while excluding only those cases that strictly meet the exclusion criteria.
